mapper.sql: id, name, avatar, create_type, tboss_user_id, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into flt_fleet (id, name, avatar, create_type, tboss_user_id, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tbossUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into flt_fleet
id,
name,
avatar,
create_type,
tboss_user_id,
create_time,
update_time,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{tbossUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update flt_fleet
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_type = #{createType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tboss_user_id = #{tbossUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update flt_fleet set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_type = #{createType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tboss_user_id = #{tbossUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into fit_fleet_line
id,
start_city_code,

end_city_code,
end_city_name,
fleet_id,
max_speed,
create_user_id,
oil_cons_limit,
create_time,
update_time,

insert into fit_line_car_mapping
id,
line_id,
car_id,
create_user_id,
create_time,
update_time,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{lineId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{carId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.select:
select t.id,t.start_city_code startCityCode ,t.start_city_name startCityName,t.end_city_code endCityCode ,t.end_city_name endCityName,t.max_speed maxSpeed ,t.oil_cons_limit oilConsLimit,t.fleet_id fleetId ,t1.name fleetName,t.create_time createTime from fit_fleet_line t left join flt_fleet t1 on t.fleet_id = t1.id where 1 = 1
and t.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select id,line_id lineId,route_city_code routeCityCode, route_city_name routeCityName,create_user_id createUserId,create_time createTime,update_time updateTime from fit_fleet_line_route where 1 = 1
and line_id = #{lineId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select id,line_id lineId,car_id carId,create_user_id createUserId,create_time createTime,update_time updateTime from fit_line_car_mapping where 1 = 1
and line_id = #{lineId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
